entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 12:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -2.6°C
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NNW 19 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
